title: Bug 102623: Image can't be refreshed after importing again
OB: After importing an image named 'image1.jpg' into the layout view, the image cannot be refreshed.
EB: The image should be refreshed and updated after importing it again.
SR: 1. Import an image named 'image1.jpg' into the layout view. 2. Delete this image file from the outline image. 3. Rename 'image2.jpg' as 'image1.jpg'. 4. Check if the image is refreshed and has been successfully updated in the layout view.
